body.name: VASAGLE Bathroom Floor Cabinet, Bathroom Storage Organizer Rack Stand, Multifunctional Corner Unit, 2 Drawers, Grey UBBC042G01
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 17 mins
features: [Every Inch Counts] Don't neglect the corner space of your bathroom! Max out storage space—and keep your everyday essentials at your fingertips—by opting for this slimline 11.8”D x 11.8”W x 35.1”H freestanding cabinet

[Durable-Meets-Versatile] Made from sturdy engineered wood, this floor cabinet with a simple design and classic grey finish is not only built to withstand everyday use, but also looks striking in your living room, hallway, study, and more

[In Sight or Out of Sight?] It’s up to you! This clever bathroom cabinet boasts a super-handy open shelf for your oft-used items, while 2 spacious drawers to hide not-so-pretty bath items (we're looking at you, extra toilet paper)

[The Easier, the Better] With numbered parts provided, the assembly has never been this fast and easy—simply tighten the screws with the easy-to-follow instructions and you’ll have this corner unit set up in no time
[What You Get] A floor bathroom cabinet that creates a country-yet-modern aesthetic that mixes flair and function, with an open shelf and 2 drawers for a clean, mess-free space

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features elegant vertical lines and classic grey finish, it is not only just a piece of furniture but also a great decoration for your home. Smooth-lacquered engineered wood panels ensure perfect stability and long service life. Not Only for Bathrooms: With 1 open shelf and 2 roomy drawers, this VASAGLE bathroom cabinet creates more storage space while offering classic elegance in your bathroom. It’s also ideal for your living room, study, hallway, and more. Also, the anti-toppling devices are provided to enhance safety. Specifications: Color: GreyMaterial: MDF (Medium Density Fiberboard)Product Size: 11.8”D x 11.8”W x 35.1”H (30 x 30 x 89 cm)Open Shelf Size: 10.6”D x 11.4”W x 9.5”H (27 x 29 x 24 cm)Inner Size of Drawer: 9.6”D x 10.6”W x 8.6”H (24.5 x 27 x 22 cm)Product Weight: 21.4 lb (9.7 kg) Package Contents: 1 x Bathroom Cabinet1 x Accessory Kit1 x Anti-Tip Kit1 x Instructions VASAGLE Notes: Wipe with damp cloth for cleaning.Children must use the product under adult supervision.Children are not allowed to play or climb on the product to avoid potential injury caused by toppling.For safety, be sure to secure the product to the wall with the included anti-tip kit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect small cabinet for guest bath
reviews.reviewText: I love this. I had an awkward space in my guest bathroom between the toilet and vanity, and I needed a place to store towels for guests. This shelf is perfect for my needs.It came very well packaged. Every single part was labeled with an easy-to-remove sticker. (Where possible, the stickers were on the sides of the boards. Look for them.)This was the easiest cabinet I have ever assembled. I am a 65-year-old lady and I assembled this by myself in less than an hour. All I needed was a standard Phillips head screwdriver. Every screw hole lined up perfectly. The directions (pictures only) were very clear. Sometimes assembling furniture is a nightmare -- I kept thinking I must be missing something because this was so easy.The cabinet looks nicer than I expected. It has a bright white finish and it is sturdy. The back is screwed on, instead of nailed on with small brads like so many cabinets.I store extra tp in the bottom drawer (8 rolls fit), towels on the other two shelves, and a basket of guest toiletries on the top. Perfect for a guest bathroom.I highly recommend this product. I absolutely love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better quality than expected
reviews.reviewText: This was such a great deal, I was afraid it would be on the flimsy side or too small, but it turned out great! Easy to assemble, sturdy, tall, & lots of storage room. I use it as a night stand right now, but it would work great in bathroom, kitchen, or foyer also. I may get another… :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent alternative to the popular "flat box" furniture store
reviews.reviewText: Got two of these to replace side units for our bed as we upgraded our bed size and now have less room. They assembled flawlessly - instructions were clear, all hardware and panels were numbered and accounted for, and went together quickly with a #2 Philips screwdriver. My wife loves the look, the drawer storage, and shelf display. They are also very solid and secure. Definitely recommended for anywhere that needs slimmer cabinets/shelving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but cute
reviews.reviewText: Lots of screws but pretty easy to assemble. One of the pieces was damaged, but it isn’t really noticeable. It is slightly smaller than expected, even with looking at the measurements before buying, and it’s a little wobbly, but it’s cute and I can use put a sticky furniture pad under the leg for stability

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL, STURDY, FUNCTIONAL
reviews.reviewText: VERY PLEASED WITH THIS CABINET. STRONG, EASY FUNCTION OF DRAWERS, STURDY FRAME....NICE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my office since my desk doesn't have many drawers. The assembly was done is an hour or so, simple and well laid out instructions. The cabinet is sturdy and the drawers are deeper than I thought they would be and the quality better than I expected. This is a great product for ay room of the house!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Update: They replied quickly to my email and sent me the missing screws that week. The bathroom storage piece is nice, just how it looks and the usual good quality from vasagle, especially for the price.Normally I love Vasagle. And the piece itself is great. But it came without an entire pack of the screws necessary to build the drawers.This put a direct halt on my cleaning/storing/organizing for the day. Went to buy the same screws from the hardware store--the rest of the items on the "make sure everything is there" chart drawings are to-scale with the actual item in real life. Apparently this one isn't--both screws I got from the hardware store are too thick, and split the wood.So I have emailed Vasagle support to get the pack of P screws that were supposed to come with this but didn't.Until I hear back from them and get a pack of screws from them, this item gets one star. Will change the rating based upon the customer support response. I hate to rate an item for this reason because of a mistake, but the item is useless without the screws, and if they don't send me the missing pack, they deserve 1 star so I will leave it as such. I have spent so much money on past Vasagle items (not that this makes a literal difference, I've worked in retail plenty) that if they are unwilling to ship me a single pack of screws I will go back and change all my vasagle reviews to one star.Hopefully, when you order this, it comes with all of the tools to put it together!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars sturdy, compact design, easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Assembly: I rarely do carpentry or assembly work. It took me about 1.5 hours to put it together.Design: it is compact. I use it as a nightstand.Sturdiness: I have been using it for a couple of years now and it is still like new.
Fits my bathroom space and looks great. Nicely made, pretty solidly built and easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewTitle: decent quaity and just as described. Very easy to assemble. Very sturdy. Should last for years
reviews.reviewText: This was sold as a bathroom unit but I bought it as extra storage for my small guest room/ office. It is nice and small which is what I needed. Perfect next to my desk to hold paperwork and pens, etc.
Quedó perfecto en el baño, muy útil. No me gustó que las paredes traseras sean de cartón y lo fondos de los cajones también. No fue complicado armarlo, sin embargo, si se lleva mucho tiempo.

Clear at least an hour to assemble but no worries it’s very simple. Great quality, strong, sturdy, and beautifully designed. Makes a great solution to storage problems in small bathrooms. Love it. Arrived ahead of time, bonus!
